definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: An elegant glass jar full of salty and delicious California Pistachios , want it?
sentences.chinese: 雅致的罐子，装满了咸香的加州开心果。想要吗？

sentences.english: The ornamental ironwork lends a touch of elegance to the house.
sentences.chinese: 铁艺饰件为房子略添雅致。

sentences.english: Paper margin inner-fold, product appearance is elegant.
sentences.chinese: 纸边内折，产品外观雅致。

sentences.english: Your room is nice and it's tastefully decorated.
sentences.chinese: 你的家真漂亮，装饰得真雅致。

sentences.english: Lamp holder, lamp post moderate size, color and delicate, grace appearance modeling.
sentences.chinese: 灯头，灯杆粗细适中，色彩调和雅致，造型雍容大方。

sentences.english: And white orchid adornment, make interior space more clean and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 而白色兰花装饰则使室内空间变得更加干净雅致。

sentences.english: It was the most elegant part of the house.
sentences.chinese: 这是整幢房子里最雅致的地方。

sentences.english: An elegant summerhouse where you can find tranquility in a hustling surrounding.
sentences.chinese: 闹中取静的凉亭颇有几分雅致。

sentences.english: The spa with gym offers a spacious relaxing environment.
sentences.chinese: 水疗中心设有健身室，环境宽敞雅致。

sentences.english: Try some powerful heels with a delicate frock.
sentences.chinese: 试试一些御姐范的高跟配上雅致的连衣服。

sentences.english: Our next stop is the exquisitely tasteful Massaya winery.
sentences.chinese: 我们的下一站是精巧雅致的Massaya酒庄。

sentences.english: The flower garden was tastefully laid out.
Duchesses , the most delicate and charming women in the world.
sentences.chinese: 公爵夫人们，世界上最雅致最可爱的妇女。
她戴着一顶雅致的小帽子。

sentences.english: Capocaccia wine has a ruby-red color and lean flavors.
sentences.chinese: 酒体呈亮丽的红宝石颜色，香气雅致。

sentences.english: This dictionary is magnificently printed and tastefully appareled.
sentences.chinese: 这部词典印刷精美，装帧雅致。

definition: variant of 別緻|别致[bie2 zhi4]
serene and elegant (of a place)/ethereal (of music)
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
simple and neat/quiet (colors)/unobtrusive/(of food) light/not greasy or strongly flavored
(of a location) quiet and secluded/beautiful and secluded
interesting and appealing (of old locations, objects etc)
